title: Crypto.Games
author: Crypto.Games
content: Keno Giveaway - We're giving away $25 in BTC to the player who hits 1 millionth Keno bet.Rules- All coins except Playmoney are allowed.- Minimum bet: 100 credits.- Game mode must be set to "Classic".- To claim reward, player has to report in chat within 5 minutes after hitting the required BetID.- If the bet doesn't fit requirements or player doesn't claim reward, rules above will apply to the next eligible bet until we have a winner.More info about Crypto.Games on this thread.Catch the winning spirit!

comments.author: s0lidus
comments.body: There are around 180k bets to go!

comments.author: s0lidus
comments.body: Raguel won this round. Congratz!Up to next millionth bet
